title: Brand New Logan Square 2BD Apt. W/D in Unit. See Video Below.
posting_body: This building is located in the up and coming neighborhood of Logan Square.
Close to 90/94 expressway, perfect for commuters.
Steps from CVS, Target, Starbucks, XSport Fitness, HomeGoods, and much more.
Regal Cinemas is just down the street as well.
Just a few blocks away from Milwaukee Ave which has endless restaurants, shops, and nightlife.
This renovated two bed unit has hardwood floors throughout and one bathroom.
Both bedrooms are spacious and have ceiling fans.
The living room has tons of windows which fill the room with natural light.
The kitchen has been upgraded with new cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and a dishwasher.
Laundry is located in-unit and cats are welcome.
Call today to see to schedule a showing!
